comments: She is definitely still figuring out what methods of teaching work for her students. She expect students to read the textbook when it is assigned. She can be flexible when assignments have to be turned in. The only thing I dislike about her teaching style is that she didn\'t remind students when the reports were due...keep the syllabus handy.

she is a very new and young teacher who is still trying to figure out how to relate to her students. i heard some classmates call her a B**** but its only because they give her a hard time in class and she has to reprimand them. she is very helpful when you talk to her about essays and gives good input. she brings up cool issues in class discussion
